verbose_text: Also, naringenin caused a reduction in the activity of the steroidogenic enzymes 3beta-hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase (3beta-HSD) and 17beta-hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase (17beta-HSD) in the PCO rat model.
evidence: naringenin caused a reduction in the activity of the steroidogenic enzymes 3beta-hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase (3beta-HSD) and 17beta-hydroxysteroid dehydrogenase
